text: Guido Bellido Ugarte (born 7 August 1979) is a Peruvian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Peru from 29 July 2021 until 6 October 2021 during the Pedro Castillo presidency. He is also a member of the Congress of the Republic of Peru since 26 July 2021. Bellido is a member of Free Peru. He was born in Livitaca District, Peru. On 6 October, Bellido resigned as the Presidency of the Council of Ministers, after President Castillo asked for his resignation. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Peru
title: Guido Bellido
